I loved all of it. I came for monster girl and the like and got what I came for 9/10

That being said I'd rate this a good 7.5/10 or an 8/10. It does stuff other doujin did too, its your standard harem. The art is incredible, its pretty standard and enjoyable by a huge degree of people although if you're looking for kinkier stuff or something never been done before, this doujin might fall short of expectations.

Have fun reading.

The chapters about Colin and his Harem is your standard Harem setup where the MC keeps getting more girls as the story progress with some magical fantasy hijinxes.

The last two chapters are pretty gross though. People who want the standard Harem thoroughfare might not like it and feel the "Colin Chapters" are ruined by the addition of those chapters. Read at your own discretion.

People who like grotesque monster impregnation might appreciate the last two chapters though.
EXTRA THICC
Would have been nice if there were more chapters based on either the fox girl or the dragon. The last two chapters just weren't really that appealing to me.
This artis is getting grosser and grosser but that's okay
